attributes.action: Uses UK universities to enhance and modernise the UK economy.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has some of the world's tops universities yet we are slow at applying the knowledge thy have have to the wider economy. For example, 3 of the top 10 engineering/technology universities are from the UK yet do we apply this competitive advantage. Why we do not encourage universities to apply their knowledge to the wider economy by selling technology/patents to UK companies etc rather than foreign companies.
